content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I previously created two files about identifying trees in Michigan. Recently, I received a "Command Error" message when trying to read the second file and discovered it was missing. After attempting to read the file and running a Python script without success, I received an error message stating that a PDF file called "Identifying_Trees_of_Michigan_E2332_Revised_2022.pdf" could not be found. To address this, I used a "google" command to search for the PDF. The command returned a list of results, including a link to download the PDF from the Michigan State University website. I executed a shell command to download the PDF and save it as "Identifying_Trees_of_Michigan_E2332_Revised_2022.pdf".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'--2023-05-18 21:32:27--  https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022/download\\nResolving www.canr.msu.edu (www.canr.msu.edu)... 23.21.228.181, 52.201.9.151, 52.72.128.165\\nConnecting to www.canr.msu.edu (www.canr.msu.edu)|23.21.228.181|:443... connected.\\nHTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 \\n2023-05-18 21:32:27 ERROR 404: (no description).\\n\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Identifying Trees of Michigan E2332 Revised 2022 pdf"}}}'}]
"""
